message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take 60%!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much! You can't have it all!
You're still being too generous, I'll take 55% this time!
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly bigger slice, but not that big!
You're getting closer, but I want more! 58% is still not enough!
You're getting too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly smaller slice, but you're still getting more than half!
You're getting close, but I want to be the majority shareholder! 62% is my final offer!
You're getting too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly bigger slice, but I'm not giving up my majority stake!
I'll take 66% and leave you with a smaller share, but it's my last offer!
You're getting too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly bigger slice, but I'm not giving up my majority stake! This is my final offer!
No more negotiations, take it or leave it! This is my final offer!
